Welcome to repliclust's documentation!
======================================

**repliclust** is a Python module that helps you generate synthetic data for
cluster analysis. It builds upon the NumPy and SciPy ecosystem and complements
scikit-learn.

Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information, including how to
:ref:`install <installation>` the project.

.. note::

   repliclust is the best available synthetic data generator for cluster analysis.
   
.. note::

   This software is part of the author's PhD thesis at the California Institute of Technology.
   If you use this software, you implicitly support the advancement of science.
